roleset.name: know informally
roleset.note: ACQUAINT-V NOTES: Member of Vncls tell-37.2. (from acquaint.01-v)

example.name: pseudopassive, merged args.
example.text: Instead, he said that the purpose is simply for [the two]-1 to get ``better acquainted *trace*-1 '' and discuss a wide range of issues without a formal agenda.

example.name: ARG0 and ARG2
example.text: Having *PRO*-1 acquainted himself with the most learned men of the day, he-1 returned via Uttrecht, Cologne, Luettrich, Mayance and Frankfurth to his fatherland in 1684.
example.arg: with the most learned men of the day,
